oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: History of organics

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Table of Contents: - How the pioneers provoked the criticism from Science - The long way towards institutionlized organic research - Research priorities of FiBL over the last three decades - FiBL's broad commitment
